options.description: Job role

options.name: firstName
options.description: A contact's first name

options.name: graduationDate
options.description: A contact's graduation date. This property is required for the Facebook Ads Integration. This property will be automatically synced via the Lead Ads tool. When using expressions, the time should be specified in YYYY-MM-DD hh-mm-ss format

options.description: The industry a contact is in

options.displayName: Church Slavic; Old Slavonic; Church Slavonic; Old Bulgarian; Old Church Slavonic

options.name: jobFunction
options.description: A contact's job function. This property is required for the Facebook Ads Integration. This property will be automatically synced via the Lead Ads tool

options.name: jobTitle
options.description: A contact's job title

options.name: lastName
options.description: A contact's last name

options.name: latestTrafficSource
options.description: The source of the latest session for a contact

options.name: latestTrafficSourceDate
options.description: The time of the latest session for a contact

options.name: leadStatus
options.description: The contact's sales, prospecting or outreach status. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.displayName: Legal Basic For Processing Contact Data Name or ID
options.name: processingContactData
options.description: Legal basis for processing contact's data; 'Not applicable' will exempt the contact from GDPR protections. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: lifeCycleStage
options.description: The qualification of contacts to sales readiness. It can be set through imports, forms, workflows, and manually on a per contact basis. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: linkedinUrl
options.description: The URL of the contact's LinkedIn page

options.name: maritalStatus
options.description: A contact's marital status. This property is required for the Facebook Ads Integration. This property will be automatically synced via the Lead Ads tool

options.name: memberEmail
options.description: Email used to send private content information to members

options.name: membershipNote
options.description: The notes relating to the contact's content membership

options.name: message
options.description: A default property to be used for any message or comments a contact may want to leave on a form

options.name: militaryStatus
options.description: Contact's military status. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

options.name: mobilePhoneNumber
options.description: A contact's mobile phone number

options.name: numberOfEmployees
options.description: The number of company employees. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: originalSource
options.description: The first known source through which a contact found your website. Source is automatically set by HubSpot, but may be updated manually. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: persona
options.description: A contact's persona

options.name: phoneNumber
options.description: A contact's primary phone number

options.name: postalCode
options.description: The contact's zip code. This might be set via import, form, or integration.

options.name: prefferedLanguage
options.description: Set your contact's preferred language for communications. This property can be changed from an import, form, or integration. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: prospectingAgentLastEnrolled
options.description: The last time the Prospecting Agent enrolled this contact

options.name: relationshipStatus
options.description: A contact's relationship status. This property is required for the Facebook Ads Integration. This property will be automatically synced via the Lead Ads tool

options.name: salutation
options.description: The title used to address a contact

options.name: school
options.description: A contact's school. This property is required for the Facebook Ads Integration. This property will be automatically synced via the Lead Ads tool

options.name: seniority
options.description: A contact's seniority. This property is required for the Facebook Ads Integration. This property will be automatically synced via the Lead Ads tool

options.name: startDate
options.description: A contact's start date. This property is required for the Facebook Ads Integration. This property will be automatically synced via the Lead Ads tool. When using expressions, the time should be specified in YYYY-MM-DD hh-mm-ss format

options.name: stateRegion
options.description: The contact's state of residence. This might be set via import, form, or integration.

options.name: stateRegionCode
options.description: The contact's state or region code

options.name: status
options.description: The status of the contact's content membership. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: streetAddress
options.description: A contact's street address, including apartment or unit #

options.name: timeZone
options.description: The contact’s time zone. This can be set automatically by HubSpot based on other contact properties. It can also be set manually for each contact.

options.name: twitterUsername
options.description: The contact's Twitter handle. This is set by HubSpot using the contact's email address.

options.name: websiteUrl
options.description: The contact's company website

options.name: whatsappPhoneNumber
options.description: The phone number associated with the contact’s WhatsApp account

options.name: workEmail
options.description: A contact's work email. This property is required for the Facebook Ads Integration. This property will be automatically synced via the Lead Ads tool

To lookup a user by their email, use the Search operation

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
